name: ULTRA EVADER
description:
ULTRA EVADER is a super fast  and hard arcade game with unusual controls that enable faster reactions. 

Evade: Dodge blocks by holding down LEFT or RIGHT to move to the sides. If you let go you will return to the center.

Destroy: Press FORWARD to dash into the big glowing blocks and break them.

Collect: Be sure to get all glowing blocks to increase your multiplier and receive loads of bonus points. If you miss one then your multiplier will be reset.

MUSIC BY MRTN
